docs.lead_paragraph: Gov. Sarah Palin's views on abortion are pretty well known. She's opposed, pretty much across the board. And the entire right-leaning side of the world heralded her and her husband's decision to go forward with a pregnancy, at 44, that resulted in the April birth of Trig, who has Down syndrome. She barely talks about her infant, except to say that she understands special needs children because of Trig.
docs.abstract: The Republican vice-presidential nominee walks a really thread-bare line on abortion due to rape or incest.
docs.snippet: The Republican vice-presidential nominee walks a really thread-bare line on abortion due to rape or incest.

docs.abstract: "Spectrum" (1998) by Richard Phillips. Not since Andy Warhol had a cameo on "The Love Boat" in 1985 have contemporary art fans had this great an excuse to watch prime time television. As the Van der Woodsens - Lily (Kelly Rutherford) and Serena (Blake Lively) - moved back into their renovated loft on "Gossip Girl" [...]
